attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This guy is not going to win the election he is a horrible person what he’s does to Hispanic kids is wrong your rasict! , how do you plan to make America great again without being rasict us so called “ aliens “ make your crops and keep all farms functioning idiot , I think you don’t eat fruit so you don’t care. Your so shallow about Hispanics I hope and wish  your never president again.

attributes.title: SCREW TRUMP
attributes.review: This app is the most horrible thing I’ve ever seen, and you know why? CAUSE ITS HAS TRUMP IN IT. Trump says he made America great again when we all know trump made even worse what it already, Plus the fact that he wants to shut down tt is just out RAGES, This is unexplainable upsetting that a actual bag of Cheetos is our president. It make me not wanna eat cheese Cheetos. I feel so bad for Barron Trump to have to deal with this. Trump is a racist, orange, white, clown.🤡

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app was not capable of anything that it was supposed to be doing. There were so many glitches and it continued to send me hundreds of notifications even after I said no more notifications. There were many typing errors and I feel as thought that it very unprofessional. This app needs to be deleted!!! It was not capable of anything but taking up storage.

attributes.title: my dog and dad went crazy from this app
attributes.review: after downloading this app to support MY president it let off a high pitched noise. my poor pup and nearly deaf father have gone absolutely insane over it. i just tell them to deal with it because supporting trump is much more important than their sanity. one star though for the high pitched ringing also it causes every other app on my phone to lag.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: so i downloaded this bc i LOVE mr trump😻😻 and all he’s done for america 🤮 oh whoops, i meant ❤️❤️ anyways, when i opened the app to give it my phone number, a DEMON  possessed my phone 🙀🙀 and PUNCHED MY UNBORN BABY 🙀🙀 and so now he’s dead 😴 which is crazy bc i thought trumpie’s supporters were against abortion? guess not 😋✨ good thing i was gonna get rid of him anyways or i would have been real upset. if i could rate this app any lower than i would 👹 DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🙀🙀

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
It took FOREVER to download, glitches every SECOND, does not load when I try to open anything, and keeps sending me way too many notifications.
To top it off, this app froze my phone, sent everyone I know random text messages, and stole my bank account information.
Still trying to financially recover.
If I could give it 0 stars, I would.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🐷🍊
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what these trump supporters🤡were hyping about and once I opened the app my life flashed before my eyes🤯. I almost DIED!!! I saw a big fat racist, rapist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic orange man!!!! I was flabbergasted 😮!! It traumatized me so bad that now I’m afraid of oranges🍊🍊. Specially the app is so slow, horrible💩. I tried to support this Cheeto and buy something but I accidentally cut my card in half. Oops🙈! How can these people support a rude BUNKER BOY!! 🤡🙊🧚🙈🍊

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app took 3 weeks to download and I could use my phone while waiting. My dog died and my family had no way of contacting because i was waiting aswell as My older brother who has been missing for 25 years has came back and the only phone number he remembered was mine but his calls weren't going through because of this app.

attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED
attributes.review: WARNING SENSITIVE CONTENT: I downloaded this stupid app and you’ll never guess what I came into contact with...an assassin! he tried to kill me and my family. he said this quote “IF YOU DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP ILL EAT YOUR GRANDPARENTS AND USE THEIR ASHES AS CHICKEN SEASONING” I was abt to collapse on the floor from crying so much I was terrified. he took my dog and spray painted him orange to match the beloved president. I DO NOT recommend getting this app you will meet a very mean bully assassin! btw my dog is alr he just needs to go to therapy :(

attributes.title: Worst made app ever
attributes.review: Such a bad app. Took forever to download. Once it downloaded my phone completely crashed. Had to actually get a new one. When I talked to the people at the genius bar they said the app was defective and a lot of people were having the same problem as me once they downloaded it. Unless you are looking for a new phone, don’t download this!
